channel.title: ESG Report on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ESG Report on FinanClub

item.title: 1346 BTE
item.description: score:1346 Chances: Baytex Energy Corp. released its 2022 Environment, Social and Governance (ESG) Report, demonstrating a commitment to transparency and accountability, and managing the environmental and social impacts of its business. Baytex Energy Corp. reports its operating and financial results for the three and six months ended June 30, 2023, following the Ranger transaction, positioning the company as a well-capitalized and diversified North American exploration and production company.

item.title: 1072 ELAN
item.description: score:1072 Chances: Elanco Animal Health’s shares surged after the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency confirmed the continued approval of the Seresto flea and tick collar for dogs and cats. EPA’s confirmation of the safety profile of Seresto flea and tick collar may positively impact Elanco Animal Health’s reputation and sales.
